body_html: Yup, the role of weight seems subtle when involved with variable. As said by you, we can pretend a variable as constant by tf.stop_gradients, so I'd prefer to the second one, which is more general.

body: Yup, the role of weight seems subtle when involved with variable. As said by you, we can pretend a variable as constant by tf.stop_gradients, so I'd prefer to the second one, which is more general.
